Joe Frambach

Projects

Agendash

A dashboard for Agenda, the job scheduling library for node.

Optisizely

A cool visualization to show how much your Optimizely test adds to page load time.

Battleship AI

Practice Javascript by forking this repo and building your own Battleship AI.

run.travel

An easy way for marathoners to find, schedule, and plan marathons.

Magic Mirror

A smart mirror to show your agenda and the weather forecast.

Couchsurfing Widget

Embeddable widget for sharing your Couchsurfing profile.

Pokemural

Projecting a screenshot of a mural onto plywood.

QR Code on a Cylinder

A qr code wrapped around a tube is distorted and cannot scan. This script projects an image onto a tube.

Frambike

Sandblasting and repainting a road bike, with a custom-made logo.

OMGWTFADD

A weekend project. The game begins with 30 seconds of Tetris play, then the board rotates π for 30 seconds of Breakout play.

Utahraptors

Dealing with a true life-and-death scenario: which direction do you run if you're surrounded by three raptors?
